title.narrative: Support for Gaia Green social enterprise strengthening and sustainability

description.narrative:
In 2018 Gaia Green and CAFOD started to work together on a process to identify the strengths and weaknesses of the enterprise, focusing on priority areas for improvement. The need to improve engagement and understanding of consumer demand in Yangon surfaced as an important area to develop. Gaia Green understood that having a social and environmental cause behind their product was not enough to be able to strengthen their position in the market, but that they also needed to improve their understanding of the market and learn more about how distributors and consumers choose their products. CAFOD supported a process whereby Gaia Green worked with a local marketing expert to scope potential buyers.
After 2020 covid crisis and 2021 military coup Gaia Green struggled to remain open and functional but managed to adapt based on mobile sales, online orders, and reduction of some of staff and product making. For this project CAFOD will support the social enterprise in three main areas: - Innovation and product testing based on market assessment - Sales expansion in Yangon and strengthening marketing capacity - Sustainability of current staff
CAFOD and Gaia Green project that with these interventions during 2022 and based on a stable environment the social enterprise will be able to continue its expansion in coming years.
